snippet: The very idea that the Coke brand may be in trouble is startling, given that Coca-Cola has thrived for 127 years, surviving countless passing health fads.
abstract: James B Stewart Common Sense column examines challenges facing Coca-Cola, which reigned for years as No 1 brand worldwide, but has recently had trouble staying relevant; says that very idea that Coke brand may be in trouble is startling, given that product has thrived for 127 years, surviving countless passing health fads.
lead_paragraph: The very idea that the Coke brand may be in trouble is startling, given that Coca-Cola has thrived for 127 years, surviving countless passing health fads.

headline.print_headline: For Coke, Challenge Is Staying Relevant
headline.main: For Coke, Challenge Is Staying Relevant
